roleset.name: provide proof that a document is authentic

example.name: authenticate-v: Transmissions
example.text: And no messages can be transmitted on these circuits until senders andreceivers authenticate in advance by special codes that the messagesactually come from their purported sources.
example.arg: that the messagesactually come from their purported sources.

example.name: authentication-n
example.text: Biro told me that his request for millions of dollars from the Parkers came after he had finished his authentication of their painting.

roleset.note: AUTHENTICATE-V NOTES: Frame by Claire based on sentences in ULA Brown; nominal 'authentication' based on BOLT-7. No Verbnet entry, comparison with 'verify.' (from authenticate.01-v)
AUTHENTICATION-N NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from authentication.01-n)

roleset.name: the real deal, genuine

example.name: authentic-j: arg1
example.text: And the thing that makes Me lucky is how incredibly dedicated and authentic her love for me is

roleset.note: AUTHENTIC-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. Relation to 'authenticate', but not unified. (from authentic.01-j)
